meanings.definition: A whole number; a number that is not a fraction.
meanings.sent1: An integer is a number you can count on your fingers.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy five integers for my math homework.
meanings.sent3: Why did the integer go to school? To get more whole!
meanings.sent4: The integer stood tall among the fractions, proud and complete.
meanings.sent5: The bright red integer shone brightly in the sea of decimals.
